name: Little Critters
summary:
"A Tower Defense Game That Hits Home" - UploadVR

In mixed reality, fortify your room with super-smart traps and turn it into a fun critter-smashing zone to defend against the oncoming horde!

From the creators of Little Cities comes Little Critters, a casual tower defense game made for mixed reality.

Key features:

👾 Put virtual traps on your real-world furniture or on the ceiling, walls, or floor. Try out new ideas and strategies to win!
